title: Game issues
body: I went from being an good player to the worse player since last week. Seems like my buttons aren't working. Has anyone else experienced any issues?

replies.body:
If you're having problems with your hotkeys not working correctly, try giving those a manual reset to see if that helps!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
